name: Moon Bus
description:
Moon Bus brings 2 - 4 players together to play a competitive game on a single computer. Players must skillfully maneuver their lunar lander style busses to compete for passengers. Disrupt other players or keep it civil, fly fast or fly safe, there are many play styles but whoever delivers the most passengers will come out on top!

Couch Multiplayer Only.
2 - 4 Players.
